segment.source: Converting WDCML to Markdown for Open Publishing
segment.target: Converting WDCML to Markdown for Open Publishing

segment.source: This topic describes how to convert WDCML to Markdown that validates and renders correctly in the MSDN Open Publishing environment.
segment.target: This topic describes how to convert WDCML to Markdown that validates and renders correctly in the MSDN Open Publishing environment.

segment.source: The preferred way to do this is by using the built-in support in the cbx build command.
segment.target: The preferred way to do this is by using the built-in support in the cbx build command.

segment.source: Here's how:
segment.target: Here's how:

segment.source: Go to IDWeb and ensure that you are a member of the MSDN Reporting SG for your domain.
segment.target: Go to IDWeb and ensure that you are a member of the MSDN Reporting SG for your domain.

segment.source: You may need to wait up to 24 hours for permissions to propagate.
segment.target: You may need to wait up to 24 hours for permissions to propagate.

segment.source: Install the latest release of Pandoc.
segment.target: Install the latest release of Pandoc.

segment.source: Pandoc is updated periodically, so if it's been a while since you installed it, consider upgrading.
segment.target: Pandoc is updated periodically, so if it's been a while since you installed it, consider upgrading.

segment.source: A recent fix improved table rendering, for example.
segment.target: A recent fix improved table rendering, for example.

segment.source: By default, Pandoc installs to , which is added to your PATH.
segment.target: By default, Pandoc installs to , which is added to your PATH.

segment.source: Do an .
segment.target: Do an .

segment.source: Use to build your project into .md files.
segment.target: Use to build your project into .md files.

segment.source: After the regular cbx build, you will see two passes with progress bars.
segment.target: After the regular cbx build, you will see two passes with progress bars.

segment.source: The first is a fast pass to change .md formatting to match OP requirements.
segment.target: The first is a fast pass to change .md formatting to match OP requirements.

segment.source: The second is the A keyword conversion to URLs, which takes significantly longer.
segment.target: The second is the A keyword conversion to URLs, which takes significantly longer.

segment.source: The whole conversion can take up to an hour for a project containing 1500 topics.
segment.target: The whole conversion can take up to an hour for a project containing 1500 topics.

segment.source: If the database pass fails, you will see: Error connecting to db server.
segment.target: If the database pass fails, you will see: Error connecting to db server.

segment.source: Ensure that you have perms on the MSDN Reporting SG.
segment.target: Ensure that you have perms on the MSDN Reporting SG.

segment.source: Sometimes database access can be problematic.
segment.target: Sometimes database access can be problematic.

segment.source: If you can't connect, try again a couple hours later.
segment.target: If you can't connect, try again a couple hours later.

segment.source: PROTIP: On rare occasions (ask Jason), you may need to update the local version of with the fully qualified name of the reporting server: reporting.mtps.glbdns2.microsoft.com.
segment.target: PROTIP: On rare occasions (ask Jason), you may need to update the local version of with the fully qualified name of the reporting server: reporting.mtps.glbdns2.microsoft.com.

segment.source: Manual Conversion
segment.target: Manual Conversion

segment.source: If you have problems with the automation, please send a bug report to DDPUB.
segment.target: If you have problems with the automation, please send a bug report to DDPUB.

segment.source: The following steps are what the first pass above does.
segment.target: The following steps are what the first pass above does.

segment.source: They are listed here for posterity.
segment.target: They are listed here for posterity.

segment.source: Fix links as follows:
segment.target: Fix links as follows:

segment.source: Replace .htm link suffixes with .md, for in-project targets, for example:
segment.target: Replace .htm link suffixes with .md, for in-project targets, for example:

segment.source: Replace A keywords with URLs, for example:
segment.target: Replace A keywords with URLs, for example:

segment.source: Remove In This Section links at the top
segment.target: Remove In This Section links at the top

segment.source: Switch references to upper case Images directory to images:
segment.target: Switch references to upper case Images directory to images:

segment.source: Remove any %20 in URLs if they exist:
segment.target: Remove any %20 in URLs if they exist:

segment.source: If See Also section is present, prepend asterisks to create bulleted list.
segment.target: If See Also section is present, prepend asterisks to create bulleted list.

segment.source: If existing, delete second occurrence of local target string:
segment.target: If existing, delete second occurrence of local target string:

segment.source: Update embedded video links from: to look like this:
segment.target: Update embedded video links from: to look like this:

segment.source: Note: JasGro to follow up on video plans and correct URL
segment.target: Note: JasGro to follow up on video plans and correct URL

segment.source: Remove initial span so that OP creates correct topic title for text on browser tab:
segment.target: Remove initial span so that OP creates correct topic title for text on browser tab:

segment.source: Remove nested parenthetical version selector (v=vs.85, e.g.) from links:
segment.target: Remove nested parenthetical version selector (v=vs.85, e.g.) from links:

segment.source: (Hardware team only) For mailto links, replace nested parentheses with %28, %29: Topics that contain parentheses in the topic title also cause additional parentheses in the mailto link:
segment.target: (Hardware team only) For mailto links, replace nested parentheses with %28, %29: Topics that contain parentheses in the topic title also cause additional parentheses in the mailto link:

segment.source: Remove extra carriage returns that occur after a Note inside a numbered list item, because it causes OP to start numbering again from 1.
segment.target: Remove extra carriage returns that occur after a Note inside a numbered list item, because it causes OP to start numbering again from 1.

segment.source: Leave one blank line remaining.
segment.target: Leave one blank line remaining.

segment.source: Remove copyright line:
segment.target: Remove copyright line:

segment.source: Change any image file suffixes to lower case, e.g., .png not .PNG.
segment.target: Change any image file suffixes to lower case, e.g., .png not .PNG.

segment.source: Post-markdown conversion steps
segment.target: Post-markdown conversion steps

segment.source: Create TOC.md in parent directory.
segment.target: Create TOC.md in parent directory.
